# speak(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the utterance you specify to the speech synthesizer’s queue.

## Declaration

```swift
func speak(_ utterance: AVSpeechUtterance)
```

## Parameters

- **utterance**: An [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechUtterance] instance that contains text to speak.

## Discussion



## Controlling speech

- **continueSpeaking()**: Resumes speech from its paused point.
- **pauseSpeaking(at:)**: Pauses speech at the boundary you specify.
- **stopSpeaking(at:)**: Stops speech at the boundary you specify.
- **AVSpeechBoundary**: Specifies when to pause or stop speech.
